definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: This paper discusses the scattering problem with non-smooth boundary.
sentences.chinese: 討論了一類具有非光滑邊界的散射體的散射問題。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the scattering problem with non-smooth boundary.
sentences.chinese: 討論了一類具有非光滑邊界的散射體的散射問題。

sentences.english: In the second chapter, the forward scattering series methods have been deducted.
sentences.chinese: 第二章推導了逆散射級數法的正演過程。

sentences.english: It is useful to use greater value of detection angle for increasing the backscattering coefficient and ameliorating the ratio of signal to noise.
sentences.chinese: 可以利用大的探測角值提高背散射率以改善信噪比。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on light scattering and radiation characteristic of target and environment.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究目標與環境的光散射輻射問題。

sentences.english: The calculated field data are applied to reconstruct the contour projections of the scatterer successfully.
sentences.chinese: 計算結果用於散射體輪廓的投影重建獲得成功。

sentences.english: In this article the electromagnetic scattering characteristics of serrate gaps common in aircraft surfaces are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對飛行器表面常見鋸齒縫隙的散射特性進行了研究。

sentences.english: Andthis paper mainly interprets the electronic scattering theory.
sentences.chinese: 重點闡述了電子散射理論。

sentences.english: The particle diameter and its polydispersity were determined with laser dynamic light-scattering method.
sentences.chinese: 採用激光動態光散射法檢測粒度與粒度分佈。

sentences.english: Chapter 1 begin with an introduction and overview of the computations of perturbative scattering amplitudes.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是關於微擾散射振幅計算的導論和概述。

sentences.english: Angling a tom slightly causes sound waves to scatter, and diffuses them.
sentences.chinese: 輕微調節落地桶鼓的擺放角度使聲波散射和漫反射。

sentences.english: Ultrasonic backscattered signals can provide useful information about tissue microstructures.
sentences.chinese: 超聲背散射信號能提供反映組織微結構的有用信息。

sentences.english: See the leaf section below for a discussion of observing the two different types of scattering.
sentences.chinese: 葉科見下文討論了兩種不同類型的散射觀測。

sentences.english: The differential cross section of inelastic scattering has been calculated for a simple case.
sentences.chinese: 計算了在簡單情況下的非彈性散射的微分截面。

sentences.english: The conditions for generating the phase conjugation in Stimulated Raman Scattering backward-wave are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了受激喇曼後向波位相複共軛散射波產生的條件。

definition: to reflect/reflection (from a mirror etc)/reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)
to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
to transmit/transmission (of radiation through a medium)/passage
